CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 12 To achieve the solubility and thin film uniformity required in solution processed OPVs and OFETs , NDT1 and NDT3 functionalized with two alkoxy groups were synthesized and applied in semiconductor materials recently ( Figure 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. NDT1
2. NDT3

These are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are semiconductor materials that have been functionalized with two alkoxy groups and used in solution processed organic photovoltaics (OPVs) and organic field-effect transistors (OFETs).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. NDT1
2. NDT3

These are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. I have removed any entities that may have been irrelevant or unclear. NDT1 and NDT3 are the only materials clearly referred to in the text.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 12 To achieve the solubility and thin film uniformity required in solution processed OPVs and OFETs , NDT1 and NDT3 functionalized with two alkoxy groups were synthesized and applied in semiconductor materials recently ( Figure 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Semiconductor materials
2. NDT1
3. NDT3
4. Two alkoxy groups

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are either materials or properties that are being discussed or applied in the context of solution processed OPVs and OFETs.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Two alkoxy groups

This is the only entity in the given paragraph that clearly refers to a material property. The other entities, such as "semiconductor materials," "NDT1," and "NDT3," are either materials or specific compounds, rather than material properties. The "two alkoxy groups" are a property of the NDT1 and NDT3 compounds, as they are functional groups that have been added to these compounds.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 12 To achieve the solubility and thin film uniformity required in solution processed OPVs and OFETs , NDT1 and NDT3 functionalized with two alkoxy groups were synthesized and applied in semiconductor materials recently ( Figure 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Semiconductor materials

The "semiconductor materials" can be considered a "Property Value" entity in this context, as it refers to the materials that possess the properties of solubility and thin film uniformity, which are desirable for solution processed OPVs and OFETs.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Solubility
2. Thin film uniformity

These are the two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, as they are the desired properties of the semiconductor materials used in solution processed OPVs and OFETs.
